outputs.output_descr:
The project will develop, pilot, and adapt suitable Protected Area (PA) management paradigms in two representative wetland systems adjacent to two terrestrial protected are network. The project outcomes are; 
1. Biodiversity in wetlands is conserved within community conservation areas
2. Wise use strategies for bio-diverse wetlands implemented without loss of biodiversity
3. Community conservation models for wetland biodiversity are integrated into national wetland planning process and national PA network

project_descr: Extending Wetland Protected Areas through Community Conservation Initiatives in Nakivale and Bisina Opeta Wetland systems of Uganda project
project_title: EXTENDING WETLAND PROTECTED AREAS COMMUNITY CONSERVATION
